CustomField.description: To be used ONLY on Quote Template (Javelin Quote) for Canadian Subsidiary
CustomField.formula:
IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Account__r.Subsidiary__c), 'Javelin'),
('4 - 585 Michigan Drive' & BR() & 'Oakville ON L6L 0G1' & BR() & 'Canada' & BR() & '905-815-1906' & BR() & 'Tax ID # 885041145RT0001'),
('4461 Cox Road, Suite 302' & BR() & 'Glen Allen, VA 23060' & BR() & 'US'))
CustomField.label: Company Address
